media.headline: Gomez's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Gomez plates DeShields to open scoring
media.bigblurb: Carlos Gomez lifts a ball to right-center field for a sacrifice fly, plating Delino DeShields and giving the Rangers a 1-0 lead in the 1st

media.headline: Rangers broadcast talks Beltre
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Beltre nursing calf injury as ST winds down
media.bigblurb: The Texas Rangers broadcast booth gives an injury update on Adrian Beltre, and discusses the new institution of the 10-day disabled list

media.headline: DeShields' sacrifice fly
media.blurb: KC@TEX: DeShields plates Rua with sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Delino DeShields hits a sacrifice fly deep to left field, scoring Ryan Rua and increasing the Rangers' lead to 2-0 in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Choo's two-run double
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Choo hits an opposite-field two-run double
media.bigblurb: Shin-Soo Choo hits a ball to the opposite field in left, scoring Joey Gallo and Elvis Andrus and extending the Rangers' lead to 2-0

media.headline: Gomez's RBI double
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Gomez knocks in Choo with RBI double in 2nd
media.bigblurb: Carlos Gomez ropes a ball into the gap in left-center field for an RBI double, scoring Shin-Soo Choo and giving the Rangers a 5-0 lead

media.headline: Mondesi's great grab
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Mondesi makes a great catch at second base
media.bigblurb: Nomar Mazara laces a ball to second baseman Raul Mondesi, who quickly extends his glove to make the catch in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Rangers' broadcast on parking
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Rangers to accommodate for construction
media.bigblurb: Texas Rangers sideline reporter Emily Jones discusses the organization teaming up with ParkHub to alleviate traffic issues

media.headline: Butera's solo home run
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Butera puts Royals on the board with a homer
media.bigblurb: Drew Butera hammers a ball over the left-field wall for a solo home run, cutting the Royals' deficit to 5-1 in the 5th inning

media.headline: Odor's April Fool's Day prank
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Odor showers sideline reporter with seeds
media.bigblurb: Rougned Odor pelts Rangers sideline reporter Emily Jones with sunflower seeds while she discusses new batting helmets on April Fool's Day

media.headline: Butera nabs Profar stealing
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Butera nabs Profar attempting to steal second
media.bigblurb: Drew Butera throws out Jurickson Profar attempting to steal second base to end the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Rangers turn two in the 5th
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Rangers's double play stands after challenge
media.bigblurb: The Rangers turn a double play to get out of the 5th, and after the Royals challenge that the runner was safe at second, the out call stands

media.headline: Rangers Captain horses around
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Rangers Captain has fun on April Fool's Day
media.bigblurb: Texas Rangers mascot Rangers Captain teases the fans and pulls some pranks on April Fool's Day at the ballpark in the 6th inning

media.headline: Pena's two-run double
media.blurb: KC@TEX: Pena cuts Royals' deficit with two-run double
media.bigblurb: Brayan Pena hits a sharp liner into the gap for a two-run double, scoring Cheslor Cuthbert and Billy Burns in the 9th
